Genesis Plain Luxe Cirrus Grey 89mm Vertical Blind (Swift directblinds)

Timelessly elegant, the Genesis Plain Luxe Cirrus Vertical Blind will add a touch of cool to any room. The durable dimout fabric allows full control over light and privacy, remaining easy to coordinate with any existing palette. Expertly contrast with darker greys or more mellow scheme to make the most of this stylish shade – an exquisite fitting for any window. Stirlo Steel Grey (Blinds By Post)

Stirlo Steel Grey Plain Roller Blind The Stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room.  The fabric is composed of 100% Polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with White chain used as standard, or a Nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing. If  the width and the drop are greater than 1800mm, the fabric may be joined either by a stitch or weld dependant on our professional discretion. Made to Measure Stirlo Steel Grey Roller Blind | Privacy, Dim-Out Fabric | blindsbypost

Burst Soft Grey Roller Blind (Make My Blinds)

Off-white is one of those colour categories that we will always endorse as a choice for your blind, as it brings an elements of modest sophistication to almost any colour palette. Lacking the yellows of other more beige tones, it is much more suited to softening a primary colour but likewise is not out of place in a room filled with an earthier beat. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric. Just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. These blinds are moisture resistant too so can be installed in a kitchen or bathroom. Fed up of the sun spoiling your view of the telly? Install this dimout blind and stop the glare from ruinning your favourite show. All of our blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the British Blind and Shutter Association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.makeitsafe.org.uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with our roller blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you. Burst Soft Grey Roller Blind. A wipe clean, dim out fabric perfect for any room in the house. Available in over 60 colours and patterns.

Konya Blackout Iron Grey (Blinds By Post)

Konya Blackout Iron Grey Plain Roller Blind The Konya range boasts a huge range of blackout and thermal fabrics to use in any room. The fabric is composed of 100% Polyester, with a PVC blackout backing and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with White chain used as standard, or a Nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing. If both the width and the drop are greater than 1800mm, the fabric may be joined either by a stitch or weld dependant on our professional discretion. Made to Measure Konya Blackout Grey Roller Blind | Privacy, Thermal Fabric | blindsbypost

greygrey-blackoutgrey-blackout-rollergrey-rollerblackoutblackout-rollerroller

The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with White chain used as standard, or a Nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing. If   the width and the drop are greater than 1800mm, the fabric may be joined either by a stitch or weld dependant on our professional discretion. Konya Blackout Fossil Grey Plain Roller Blind The Konya range boasts a huge range of blackout and thermal fabrics to use in any room. The fabric is composed of 100% Polyester, with a PVC blackout backing and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with White chain used as standard, or a Nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing. If both the width and the drop are greater than 1800mm, the fabric may be joined either by a stitch or weld dependant on our professional discretion. Made to Measure Konya Blackout Fossil Grey Roller Blind | Privacy, Thermal Fabric | blindsbypost

greygrey-blackoutgrey-blackout-rollergrey-rollerblackoutblackout-rollerroller

Konya Blackout Whisper Grey (Blinds By Post)

Konya Blackout Whisper Grey Plain Roller Blind The Konya range boasts a huge range of blackout and thermal fabrics to use in any room. The fabric is composed of 100% Polyester, with a PVC blackout backing and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with White chain used as standard, or a Nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing. If both the width and the drop are greater than 1800mm, the fabric may be joined either by a stitch or weld dependant on our professional discretion. Our Eco-Friendly, recycled roller blinds are made from 100% PET recycled waste. This means that you can decorate your window with your new sustainable blind, and contribute positively to the environment! For every Sq. Metre of fabric, 9 PET bottles are used, so you'll be positively contributing to the fight on plastic pollution, as well as getting a stylish blind! Amor Dolphin Grey Roller Blind (Make My Blinds)

Add a darker grey tone to your room with the Amor Dolphin Grey blackout roller blind. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material. All of our blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the British Blind and Shutter Association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.makeitsafe.org.uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with our roller blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you. Amor Dolphin Grey Roller Blind. Blackout roller blind for the bedroom or a wipe clean roller for the kitchen our blinds are made to measure for your windows.

Amor Dolphin Grey Vertical Blind (Make My Blinds)

Add a darker grey tone to your room with the Amor Dolphin Grey blackout roller blind. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style. All of our blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the British Blind and Shutter Association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.makeitsafe.org.uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with our vertical blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you. Amor Dolphin Grey Vertical Blind

Velvet Steel Grey Roman Blind (Swift directblinds)

Our soft-touch range of velvet fabrics add a touch of luxury and softness to your home.  A multi-tonal fabric, our smooth velvet fabrics create depth when catching the light, and can create different looks depending on the time of day.  From cosy winter mornings, to breezy summers, velvet fabrics have been a firm staple in home and fashion since the 1920s and 70s. This soft roman blind in Steel Grey, introduces trending grey to your home.  A medium grey shade creates a sense of warmth, and this velvet grey roman blind creates a decadent look for a fraction of the price on the high street. Voile blinds, also known as sheer blinds, are a great way to give your home privacy whilst still letting the daylight in. The sheer fabric is thin and delicate and will give your room privacy from anyone looking in. All of our blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the British Blind and Shutter Association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.makeitsafe.org.uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with our roller blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you. The Haze Soft Grey blind is a soft and subtle grey colour that blends into the background of your window. With a soft texture to it, this is perfect for giving your home privacy in a stylish and minamalistic way. Pair alongside wooden blinds or roller

Infusion asc Stone Grey Perfect Fit (Blinds By Post)

Infusion ASC Stone Grey Perfect Fit Pleated Blind. Part of our Infusion asc range, where Advanced Solar Control (asc) creates a perfect solution for any room, reducing the sun's glare whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The ‘ASC’ refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the Summer and retaining heat in the Winter. The metallic reflective backing is therefore on the reverse of the fabric, facing towards the window.  This fabric will still allow light into the room, but giving full privacy when inside from outside. This perfect fit blind is produced in a single cell fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, uPVC windows and doors. The blind is fixed by brackets which sit between the black rubber bead and the glass, they simply slide in when installing - taking minutes per blind to fit and keeping the window guarantee!  This is a single-cell fabric, the guide wires will be exposed meaning that there will be visible holes allowing light to come through. These can be seen on our range of images above.  If you would prefer the wires to be hidden, please take a look at our 'Hive' or 'Luna' ranges.  Made to measure Infusion ASC Stone Grey Perfect Fit Pleated Blind PX4137. Our Infusion range allows in natural light but has the added benefit of having an advanced solar coating which improves energy efficiency

Eco Friendly FR Grey Panel Blind (Swift directblinds)

Our Eco-Friendly, recycled panel blinds are made from 100% PET recycled waste.  This means that you can decorate your window with your new sustainable blind, and contribute positively to the environment! For every Sq. Metre of fabric, 9 PET bottles are used, so you'll be positively contributing to the fight on plastic pollution, as well as getting a stylish blind! Made with a moisture-resistant and flame-retardant coating, your new grey panel blind can be just the thing to complete your bathroom or kitchen.  Add a soft pop of colour into your home with a grey panel blind.  Grey has been a constant trend shade, and this grey shade, with warm undertones adds a contemporary and stylish look. Panel blinds are fantastic as room dividers or for large panes of glass due to their large size, up to 5 metres width and 3 metres drop! At Swiftdirectblinds, quality is paramount, which is why not only do our hand-made panel blinds come with customer-first service, they now come with a five-year guarantee for extra peace of mind! Luna Blackout Graphite Grey Perfect Fit (Blinds By Post)

Luna Blackout Graphite Grey Perfect Fit Pleated Blind. Part of our Luna Blackout range, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, UPVC windows and doors. The "Luna Blackout" range has a   backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords through the fabric. Blackout fabric: Yes. Please note, on a perfect fit blind you may get light leakage between the material and frame. Made to measure Luna Blackout Graphite Grey Perfect Fit Pleated Blind PX72001. A contemporary blackout blind produced in a honeycomb pleated fabric providing thermal and increasing energy efficiency.

greygrey-perfect-fitperfect-fit

Hampton Grey Pleated Perfect Fit (Make My Blinds)

For a darker grey in your window the Hampton Grey Pleated is a superb option. The colour is not created in a block but rather created from a series of short strokes of mid-tone and darker greys, which layer into a deep grey fabric. Additional shading comes from the pleated ripples that create natural highlights and pooling shadows. The Perfect Fit blind fits to the window frame itself as opposed to installing on the wall, for tools-free installation in under 15 minutes. Struggling to cover your french doors? Pleated Perfect Fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time. The pleated fabric gently filters the light coming into your room, while still giving you peaceful seclusion. Looking for a solution for your conservatory windows? Perfect Fits are designed to clip on quickly and easily - with no screws, drilling or tools required Hampton Grey Pleated Perfect Fit

Delicious Grey (6510) (SoEasy Blinds)

Explore the infinite potential of beautiful fabrics and be inspired by the soft styling effects that make this collection refined and original. And due to the Roman blind's specific design, you can easily change the fabric in a matter of minutes. Just pick your choice! Elegant and decorative with soft lighting effects. Flexible and stepless positioning. Interchangeable fabrics. Fabric can be dismounted for easy cleaning. No visible cords ensures child safety. Installs in minutes.
